short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cite web sources using MLA format

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: As a college student, I find myself having to create MLA citations all the time, and most tools to do so are either tedious to use with lots of ads or expensive! Here is a basic free website MLA citation tool, hopefully I will be able to add more source types and formats in the future. Enjoy :)
